title: BRIEF-ASIC Says Used Product Intervention Power To Ban A Model Of Lending In The Short Term Credit Industry

BRIEF-ASIC Says Used Product Intervention Power To Ban A Model Of Lending In The Short Term Credit Industry

Economy 1 hour ago (Sep 12, 2019 16:40)

© Reuters. BRIEF-ASIC Says Used Product Intervention Power To Ban A Model Of Lending In The Short Term Credit Industry Sept 12 (Reuters) - AUSTRALIAN SECURITIES AND INVESTMENTS COMMISSION : * USED PRODUCT INTERVENTION POWER TO BAN A MODEL OF LENDING IN THE SHORT TERM CREDIT INDUSTRY
